pages.title: Lemon
pages.text: Lemons are fruits that can store electricity like natural batteries because of the citric acid they contain. To charge the lemons, you will need the Lemon Charger. When a lemon contains energy, it turns into a Charged Lemon
The Lemon Charger can store lighting electricity in lemons. To activate this device you will have to wait for a storm and put a lemon inside it and you will get a Charged Lemon.
